name: Mothership Madness
description:
In Mothership Mayhem, you most control a hijacked alien vessel to save humanity! 

The federation fleet is closing in, but their shields are susceptible to the alien lasers.

Avoid hitting incoming ships with lasers of the same color, or they will be destroyed!

Note : we did not have time to finish the victory screen, your score of how well you did is the number of ships you have remaining when you destroy the mothership
